text: The 1988 BCE Canadian Professional Championship was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament, which took place in September 1988 in Toronto, Canada. This was the last edition of the tournament. Alain Robidoux won the title by beating Jim Wych 8–4 in the final. ==Main draw== ==References== Category:1988 in snooker Category:1988 in Canadian sports
title: 1988 Canadian Professional Championship
